casebody.data:
No. 10-288. Hilton Hall, Warden, Petitioner v. James Ray Ward. 562 U.S. 1082, 131 S. Ct. 647, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 9407.

178 L. Ed. 2d 513,

November 29, 2010.

Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pau-peris granted. Petition for writ of certio-rari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.

Same case below, 592 F.3d 1144.
